alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 1:54PM CDT until July 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8N...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Forgan 8N. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the cimarron river in northern beaver county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Sunday was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 4.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then rise to flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. It will fall for the remainder of the period. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.4 feet on 09/19/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM CDT.
